Key Match Events: Jacob Stallings' RBI double in the ninth inning helped the Colorado Rockies beat the Detroit Tigers 4-2.
Beck homered to left center (417 feet) in the 3rd inning.
Torkelson doubled to left, Jung scored and Greene scored in the 4th inning.
Blackmon reached on infield single to second, Stallings scored, Goodman to third in the 7th inning.
Stallings doubled to right, Rodgers scored in the 9th inning.
Cave hit sacrifice fly to center, Jones scored in the 9th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Comerica Park, Detroit, Michigan with an attendance of 19,538.
The game lasted 2 hours and 33 minutes.
Umpires for the game were Alfonso Marquez (Home Plate), Lance Barrett (First Base), Jeremy Riggs (Second Base), and Mark Ripperger (Third Base).
